keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmapAll
map <m-up> scrollUp
map <m-down> scrollDown
map <m-left> scrollLeft
map <m-right> scrollRight

map <s-m-up> scrollPageUp
map <s-m-down> scrollPageDown

map <m-;> LinkHints.activateMode

map <m-f> enterFindMode
map ] performFind
map [ performBackwardsFind
